name: White V-Neck Waistcoat
description: A fresh floral waistcoat that feels like a good mood you can wear. Light, comfy, and just the right pop of charm for workdays or weekend coffee runs.
care:
●    Regular hand or machine wash with cold water.
●    Use mild detergent — air dry recommended.
●    Iron on low heat for best look.

name: Pink Bandhani V-Neck Waistcoat
description: A vibrant Bandhani waistcoat that brings instant festive flair to your look. Ideal for office wali Diwali, casual celebrations, or whenever you’re feeling a little extra in the best way.
care:
●    Regular hand or machine wash with cold water.
●    Use mild detergent — air dry recommended.
●    Iron on low heat for best look.
